00020 /*****************************************************************************
00021 
00022   sc_biguint.h -- Template version of sc_unsigned. This class
00023                   enables compile-time bit widths for sc_unsigned numbers.
00024 
00025   Original Author: Ali Dasdan, Synopsys, Inc.
00026  
00027  *****************************************************************************/

00076 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00077 //  CLASS TEMPLATE : sc_biguint<W>
00078 //
00079 //  Arbitrary size unsigned integer type.
00080 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00081 
00082 #ifdef SC_MAX_NBITS
00083 template< int W = SC_MAX_NBITS >
00084 #else
00085 template< int W >
00086 #endif
00087 class sc_biguint
00088     : public sc_unsigned
00089 {
00090 public:
00091 
00092     // constructors
00093 
00094     sc_biguint()
00095         : sc_unsigned( W )
00096         {}
00097

00099         : sc_unsigned( W )
00100         { *this = v; }
00101

00103         : sc_unsigned( W )
00104         { *this = v; }
00105

00107         : sc_unsigned( W )
00108         { *this = v; }
00109 
00110     template< class T >
00111     sc_biguint( const sc_generic_base<T>& a )
00112         : sc_unsigned( W )
00113         { a->to_sc_unsigned(*this); }
00114

00116         : sc_unsigned( W )
00117         { *this = v; }
